ygData.subject: Re: AC Dilemma
ygData.msgSnippet: I bought several pieces of steel armor and I love them because as someone said its looks cool :) I love lookin shiny. Not how you were talkin bout the weight
ygData.messageBody:
I bought several pieces of steel armor and I love them because as someone
said its looks cool :) I love lookin shiny.
Not how you were talkin bout the weight of bronze vs steel. Thats the main
reason i bought steel. I saved myself 10 lbs (only cost me 1100 plat :P).
Don't worry bout money. Soon enough you will have tons. I currently have 1600
plat in the bank i dont know what to do with :) (anyone sellin a good sword?)
Anyways, go with what you want. That will make ya the happiest, who cares
what someone else says looks the best, or is the best or whatever.

Renaldo Rallentando of the 33rd string
